examples.example: 这次考试你考得真不错，继续保持呀。

translate.english: You did really well in this exam. Keep it up.

examples.example: 今天的天气真不错，非常适合出去游玩。

translate.english: Today's weather is really nice, very suitable for going out to play.

examples.example: 你的表现真的很不错，大家都为你感到骄傲。

translate.english: Your performance is really very good, and everyone is proud of you.
